name: Quicken 2015 Backup File
summary: Learn about .QUICKEN2015BACKUP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create a backup file in Quicken, simply File → Save a Backup... and choose the destination folder. To restore data from a backup file, select File → Restore a Backup... and locate the backup file.

description: Backup file created by Quicken 2015 financial management software; saves all user and account data in a single file that can be used for backup purposes; similar to a .QUICKENBACKUP file created by Quicken Essentials, but created by the 2015 version of Quicken for Mac.
